content.description: Consider the following method, which returns an int based on its parameter x.
content.question: public static int puzzle(int x) { if (x > 20) { x -= 2; } else if (x % 2 == 0) // Line 7 { x += 4; } return x; } Consider a modification to the method that eliminates the else from line <math alttext="7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>7</mn></math> so that line <math alttext="7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>7</mn></math> becomesif (x % 2 == 0) // Modified line 7For which of the following values of x would the return values of the original method and the modified method differ?

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
